Title: Corpse Bride
Overview: Set in a 19th-century European village, this stop-motion animation feature follows the story of Victor, a young man whisked away to the underworld and wed to a mysterious corpse bride, while his real bride Victoria waits bereft in the land of the living.
Keywords: shyness, england, cheating, old town, grave, skeleton, musical, marriage, wedding ring, stop motion, animation, money, wedding, corpse, wedding ceremony, parents, dark fantasy, european, ring, piano
production_companies: Tim Burton Animation Company, Will Vinton Studios, Warner Bros., Tim Burton Productions, Laika Entertainment, Patalex Productions
Cast: Johnny Depp, Helena Bonham Carter, Emily Watson
